rows.label: qst002311_msg0001
rows.name:
I am spreading the teachings
of Acedia to everyone.

rows.label: qst002311_msg0002
rows.name:
I would love to preach
to you as well, but...

rows.label: qst002311_msg0003
rows.name:
first, I must make this Nopon before
me understand their greatness.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0101
rows.name: Moruru-san will soon open his path.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0103
rows.name:
You will be proud to have
been able to help him...
